name: Forest Animal Hunting
description:
Are you bored of traditional animal sniper games? Improve your shooting skills by killing almost all jungle wild animals from lion to wolf to save innocent goat. Real jungle environment keeps you in touch with the beautiful nature. Keep eye on every animal killing lions bears and wolves can attack from any direction. Aim and shoot! Forest animal hunter lets you hunt the most dangerous animals in the world. Your mission is to snipe the attacking beasts. Shoot the attacking animal before the innocent goats becomes prey. Spot the attacking animal press zoom to take a closer look at the victim animal then trigger fire. Master your sniper shooting skills. Become assassin animal killer. Show your skills with gun to feel the thrill and adventure of real hunting.

How to Play:

- Tap on fire to shoot located at right bottom.
- Tap on zoom present just above fire button right bottom of your device to take a close look at animal.
- 9 thrilling and challenging missions.
- choose the level to play, hunt all to unlock next
- Navigate screen on swiping on left of your phone.

Features:

- top free offline jungle shooting and hunting game.
- Excellent sniper physics and controls implemented.
- realistic 3d graphics with dynamic lighting and amazing killing effects.
- brutal Action now on your smart mobile.
- User friendly GUI and controls.
- real adventuring forest Environment looks like adventure movies.
- game with Good quality sound effects.
- Efficient weapon controls & movement.
- Best downloading gun shoot game in gaming world
